Certainly. Here are some other quick tips for preventing neck stiffness:

1. Avoid prolonged sitting or standing in the same position: Change your position frequently to avoid putting too much strain on any one area of your neck.

2. Use a supportive pillow: Make sure your pillow provides adequate support to your neck while you sleep.

3. Stretch regularly: Take a few minutes each day to do simple neck stretches, such as turning your head from side to side and tilting your head forward and backward.

4. Apply heat or cold therapy: Applying a heating pad or ice pack to your neck can help reduce stiffness and soreness.

5. Limit phone and computer use: Try to limit the amount of time you spend staring at your phone or computer screen, as this can cause strain on your neck muscles.

Remember, even small changes to your daily routine can make a big difference in preventing neck stiffness.
